p.span: McGregor school believes staff, parent and community partnerships are the key to suc

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: justify; font-size: 14px; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: cess. We believe in a high quality educational system in a supportive learning environment. McGregor has a long standing tradition of excellence that is consistent with a growing district. Academics and activities help develop a well rounded student, best preparing them for the future. Staff help all learners develop skill sets and attitudes necessary to lead productive and successful lives. McGregor supports all students for future success.

div.div: 148 South Second Street, McGregor, MN 55760 | Phone 218-768-2111 | Fax 218-768-3802
